name: LexSkySupport
_source: speak;Lex;Hello there, m'lady. Are you holding up well?
speak;Sky;I am. Thank you, Lex. And how are you?
speak;Lex;I'm doing fine. I am curious, though.
speak;Lex;If this tome exists, and we find it{tgm}...{tgm} what then?

speak;Sky;What{tgm}...{tgm} then? Well, I plan on researching it, seeing what secrets lay within. If my predictions are correct, I can use this knowledge to further our understanding of anima magic. It could be revolutionary to the field!
speak;Lex;Too many times does treasure like this go to the rich, only to line their pockets, when it could be used for so much more. But your goal is a noble one.
speak;Sky;Noble? I feel as though it's quite self explanatory. Why would one not want to use this knowledge to help people?
speak;Lex;I ask myself that same question every day{tgm}...{tgm} And yet, I still could not tell you.
